abilityDesc: Dealing Normal Skill DMG inflicts the affected opponents with [$_1] stacks of Strong Winds. When opponents are affected by Strong Winds the equipped character gains Pearlescence effect. Pearlescence: Knowledge Unit is increased by [$_2] for 4 Cycles. When nearby team member except the equipped character inflict Strong Winds to the opponents, gains the Iridescence effect. Iridescence: Knowledge Unit is increased by [$_2] for 3 Cycles. When both Pearlescence and Iridescence effects are active at the same time, the equipped character's CRIT DMG is increased by [$_3]%.
